message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering our product! We're excited to discuss the price with you. After careful consideration, we're willing to offer you the product for $1100000. We believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After re-evaluating the product's value, we're willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1050000. We believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's worth to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
